problem.title: The problem every grower faces

problem.description: In the rush of cultivation, taking notes and organizing everything takes time and costs harvest. Mybud listens to your voice, organizes by plant and delivers a visual plan so you know exactly what happened and what the next step is.

timeline.title: Plant timeline

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Questions about Mybud Collective? We answer the main ones here.

q1.q: How many plants does the system support?
q1.a: Mybud Collective is ideal for grows with 20+ plants and multiple cultivators. We support from small associations to commercial facilities.

q2.q: How does the implementation pilot work?
q2.a: We provide guided onboarding with team training, personalized setup, and dedicated support in the first weeks.

q3.a: On secure encrypted servers. You can export all data anytime.

q4.a: Yes! We work with you to adapt reports to your association's specific needs.

seo.title: MyBud Industry â€” Where brands, breeders, and manufacturers connect ethically with cultivation
seo.description: In MyBud, your brand appears at the right time with purpose, the first legitimate and ethical channel between industry and cultivation.
seo.ogImageAlt: MyBud Industry interface showing brand integration in cultivation.

hero.title: Your brand enters cultivation: at the right time, the right way.
hero.subtitle: In MyBud, marketing isn't advertising, it's useful presence within cultivation, at the exact moment growers need to decide what to use. Whether you're a manufacturer, breeder, or supplier, MyBud connects your brand to the real cultivation routine with purpose and context.
hero.cta: I want to know integration options
hero.trustElement: Brands, breeders, and manufacturers are already entering the MyBud ecosystem to speak to the right audience, at the exact moment.

problem.title: Cannabis marketing still speaks, but nobody listens.
problem.text: Brands are trapped in networks that block, ads that fall, and PDFs nobody reads. Meanwhile, those who cultivate seek real solutions and trust those who help in the process, not those who interrupt. The result is predictable: lots of noise, little connection. MyBud reverses this logic.
problem.truth: Traditional advertising doesn't reach growers where they make decisions.
problem.solution: MyBud places your brand at the exact moment of decision, with context and trust.
problem.highlight: MyBud connects brands to the right moment in cultivation, with context and trust.

ways.title: Three ways to be part of real cultivation
ways.subtitle: For brands, breeders, and manufacturers who want to be part of the grower's routine.

way1.title: Technical presence in tasks
way1.desc: Your product appears in practical actions, like watering, controlling pests, adjusting lighting, or monitoring environment. Growers find your brand exactly when they need it.

way2.title: Cultivation protocols and schedules
way2.desc: Brands and breeders transform their schedules into live tasks within the app, whether nutrition, lighting, or genetics. The cultivator chooses to follow the program and the system automatically executes tasks with your brand.

way3.title: Growers Hub â€” live product showcase
way3.desc: An exclusive area within MyBud where growers discover new products, equipment, and genetics, interact with brands, and access technical materials, all within a reliable and educational ecosystem.

ways.reinforcement: MyBud connects brands to growers at the exact moment of decision, with real context, trust, and measurable results.

impact.title: What changes when your brand appears with purpose?
impact.text: Growers who receive contextual recommendations tend to adopt the brand and replicate good practices. Every right action becomes trust. Every registered use, a vote of confidence.

testimonial.text: Since we entered MyBud, our products started being used within cultivation schedules and this generated real recognition among growers.
testimonial.author: Symbolic testimonial

legitimacy.title: Legitimate communication, guaranteed privacy.
legitimacy.intro: In MyBud, communication is educational and technical, not advertising. Data is anonymous and aggregated. Brands appear with purpose and context, respecting patients, cultivators, and the law.
legitimacy.privacy: Privacy guaranteed by design. MyBud never shares personal data or grower identities.
legitimacy.mission: Our mission is to connect brands with growers through trust, education, and respect for the cultivation process.

ecosystem.title: MyBud connects the entire cultivation chain
ecosystem.connection: Growers, brands, laboratories, professionals, associations, breeders, cannabis clubs, and manufacturers â€” all within the same ecosystem of traceability, learning, and trust.
ecosystem.impact: MyBud is more than an app: it's the technological foundation that supports the new standard of traceability and trust in the cannabis chain.

finalCta.title: Be part of the new standard of presence in cultivation.
finalCta.text: MyBud is the first ecosystem that connects brands, breeders, and equipment manufacturers ethically, usefully, and traceably. Here, marketing becomes legitimate, useful, ethical, and present again.
finalCta.community: Join the first brands shaping the future of cannabis cultivation.
